docs.text: Name Tao Wang Email wangtao19(AT)otcaix.iscas.ac.cn, 598807302(AT)qq.com WeChat tao2years Github https://github.com/tao2years Hi, I'm Tao Wang 👋 ¶ I'm a Third Year Ph.D. student in Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences (ISCAS), under the supervision of Prof. WenSheng Dou , Prof. Wei Chen , Prof. Guoquan Wu , Prof. Jun Wei , and Prof. Tao Huang . 🔭 Research interests: Static/dynamic program analysis, software reliability testing in JavaScript and IoT systems 🌱 I’m currently learning Smart Home Systems**, **Database systems ⚡ Hobby: Tennis, board games Publications ¶ Characterizing and Detecting Bugs in WeChat Mini-Programs [PDF] [ Slide ] [ Video ] [ Website ] Tao Wang , Qingxin Xu, Xiaoning Chang, Wensheng Dou, Jiaxin Zhu, Jinhui Xie, Yuetang Deng, Jianbo Yang, Jiaheng Yang, Jun Wei, Tao Huang 44 th ACM/IEEE International Conference on Software Engineering ( ICSE 2022, CCF-A ) Understanding Device Integration Bugs in Smart Home System [ PDF ] [ Video ] [ Website ] Tao Wang , Kangkang Zhang, Wei Chen, Wensheng Dou, Jiaxin Zhu, Jun Wei, Tao Huang 31 st ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis ( ISSTA 2022, CCF-A ) Honors Awarded ¶ Science and Education Collaborative Education Program Scholarship [UCAS] (2019) Merit Student [UCAS] (2020-2021) Pacemaker to Merit Student [UCAS] (2021-2022) Education ¶ Ph.D. in Software Engineering (2019.09 - present)     Institute of Software, Chinese Academy of Sciences B.S. in Software Engineering (2015.09 - 2019.07)     Big Data Experimental Class, Northeastern University
